entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.

entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
